properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_NICKNAME=?, MEM_PHONE=?, MEM_ADDR=? WHERE MEM_NO=?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NICKNAME = ? AND MEM_SCSN_FL = 'N' AND MEM_BLACKLIST = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_SCSN_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM V_BOARD WHERE BRD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEM_ID = ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM (SELECT BRD_NO, BRD_TITLE, BRD_CONTENT, MEM_ID, BRD_VIEWS, BRD_CRT_DT, BRD_UPDATE_DT, CATEGORY_NM, BRD_DEL_FL, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_LIKES LIKEBRD WHERE LIKEBRD.BRD_NO = VBRD.BRD_NO) LIKES FROM V_BOARD VBRD WHERE BRD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEM_ID = ? ORDER BY BRD_NO DESC)V) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM (SELECT COM_NO, COM_CONTENT, COM_CRT_DT, BRD_NO, MEM_ID, COM_DEL_FL FROM V_COMMENT WHERE COM_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY COM_CRT_DT DESC)V) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND MEM_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM V_COMMENT WHERE COM_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEM_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM V_CHLNG_MISSION_LIST WHERE CHLNG_FL = 'N' AND MEM_ID = ?
SELECT* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM (SELECT * FROM V_CHLNG_MISSION_LIST WHERE CHLNG_FL = 'N' ORDER BY CHLNG_NO DESC) V ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND MEM_ID = ?

SELECT * FROM CHALLENGE_MISSION_IMG WHERE CHLNG_NO IN (SELECT CHLNG_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM ( SELECT CHLNG_NO FROM V_CHLNG_MISSION_LIST WHERE CHLNG_FL = 'N' ORDER BY CHLNG_NO DESC) V) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?) AND FILE_LEVEL = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM V_CHALLENGERS WHERE CHLNG_BRD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEM_ID = ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM (SELECT CHLNG_NO, CHLNG_BRD_NO, CHLNG_BRD_TITLE, MEM_ID, CHLNG_BRD_DEL_FL, CHLNG_CATE_NM, CHLNG_BRD_CRT_DT, CHLNG_BRD_VIEWS FROM V_CHALLENGERS WHERE CHLNG_BRD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY CHLNG_BRD_NO DESC)V) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND MEM_ID = ?
